title: Plz riot remove these unjust low priority queues i have.
body: I haven't been able to play league for a good 4 months because I did not want to deal with these r%%%%%ed low priority queues I've been getting constantly.The reason I got low priority queue for the last 3 times was that of a power outage.And this time it was because I lost fucking wifi connection to the game.I'm sick and tired of this shit happening to me and if you could riot I would appreciate it if you let this one slide.(Sarcasm).

replies.body: Getting a power outage sucks, but [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats everyone equally because all leaves still cause a negative experience.  Your best bet is to play when you're sure there won't be any issues, and get through the required games.  Running into more issues could escalate your leave, so play safe!
